body_html:
I meet the same problem and solved it.
Observing that every time when I failed, the download percentages are different. Some time 0% and some time 24% etc. Thus, it must be network unstable.
So I wrote a Shell script conda install -y magma-cuda80 -c soumith and let it repeat for thousands of times using a loop and go to bed. The next day I woke up, it is done.
That's how I solve it. Not elegant...but it do works.

body:
I meet the same problem and solved it.
Observing that every time when I failed, the download percentages are different. Some time 0% and some time 24% etc.  Thus, it must be network unstable.
So I wrote a Shell script `conda install -y magma-cuda80 -c soumith` and let it repeat for thousands of times using a loop and go to bed. The next day I woke up, it is done.
That's how I solve it. Not elegant...but it do works.
